tasks.title: Project Setup and Architecture
tasks.description: Initialize React Native project with TypeScript, set up folder structure, and configure essential dependencies
tasks.details:
1. Create a new React Native project using the latest version (0.73+)
2. Configure TypeScript and ESLint
3. Set up folder structure following best practices:
   - /src
     - /components
     - /screens
     - /navigation
     - /hooks
     - /services
     - /utils
     - /store
     - /types
     - /assets
4. Install core dependencies:
   - State management: Redux Toolkit or Zustand
   - Navigation: React Navigation
   - Database: react-native-sqlite-storage
   - UI components: React Native Paper or similar
   - Form handling: React Hook Form
5. Configure basic app theme and design system
6. Set up development environment for both iOS and Android
7. Create a README with setup instructions
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify project builds successfully on both iOS and Android
2. Run TypeScript type checking to ensure no errors
3. Confirm all dependencies are correctly installed and working
4. Test basic navigation between placeholder screens
5. Verify hot reloading works correctly

tasks.title: Database Schema Implementation
tasks.description: Implement SQLite database schema based on the data models defined in the PRD
tasks.details:
1. Set up SQLite database connection using react-native-sqlite-storage
2. Create database initialization script
3. Implement the following tables based on PRD data models:
   - UserProfile (id, age, gender, height, weight, activityLevel, goal, targetWeight, dietaryRestrictions, createdAt, updatedAt)
   - NutritionPlan (id, userId, dailyCalories, proteinGrams, carbsGrams, fatsGrams, customRatios, startDate, isActive)
   - FoodItem (id, name, brand, barcode, source, servingSize, servingUnit, nutrition JSON, createdAt)
   - MealLog (id, userId, date, mealType, items JSON, notes, createdAt)
   - Recipe (id, userId, name, servings, ingredients JSON, instructions, tags, nutritionPerServing JSON, createdAt, updatedAt)
4. Create database migration system for future updates
5. Implement data access layer with CRUD operations for each model
6. Add indexes for frequently queried fields
7. Create utility functions for common database operations
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit tests for each CRUD operation
2. Test database creation and migration
3. Verify data integrity constraints
4. Performance testing for common queries
5. Test with sample data to ensure proper relationships
6. Verify proper error handling for database operations

tasks.title: User Profile and Onboarding Flow
tasks.description: Implement the user profile creation and onboarding questionnaire to collect user information for personalized nutrition planning
tasks.details:
1. Create multi-step onboarding questionnaire screens:
   - Welcome screen with app overview
   - Personal information (age, gender, height, weight)
   - Activity level selection with descriptions
   - Goal selection (lose weight, maintain, gain muscle)
   - Target weight input (conditional based on goal)
   - Dietary restrictions/preferences
2. Implement form validation for all inputs
3. Create progress indicator for multi-step process
4. Store user profile in SQLite database
5. Implement skip/later options for non-essential steps
6. Add educational tooltips explaining each metric
7. Create user profile edit screen accessible from settings
8. Implement proper keyboard handling and form navigation
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test form validation for all input fields
2. Verify data is correctly saved to database
3. Test navigation between onboarding steps
4. Verify conditional rendering based on user selections
5. Test edge cases (very low/high values)
6. Usability testing for form completion time
7. Verify profile editing functionality

tasks.title: Nutrition Plan Calculator
tasks.description: Implement the nutrition plan calculator that generates personalized macro targets based on user profile data
tasks.details:
1. Implement TDEE calculation using Mifflin-St Jeor formula:
   - Men: (10 × weight[kg]) + (6.25 × height[cm]) - (5 × age) + 5
   - Women: (10 × weight[kg]) + (6.25 × height[cm]) - (5 × age) - 161
2. Apply activity multipliers:
   - Sedentary: 1.2
   - Lightly active: 1.375
   - Moderately active: 1.55
   - Very active: 1.725
   - Extra active: 1.9
3. Adjust calories based on goal:
   - Weight loss: -500 calories
   - Maintenance: +0 calories
   - Weight gain: +500 calories
4. Calculate macronutrient targets:
   - Protein: 1.6-2.2g per kg body weight (goal-dependent)
   - Fats: 20-35% of total calories
   - Carbs: Remaining calories
5. Allow for custom macro ratio adjustments
6. Implement validation to prevent unhealthy targets
7. Store calculated plan in NutritionPlan table
8. Create recalculation function for weekly updates
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit tests for all calculation formulas
2. Test with various user profiles and verify correct outputs
3. Verify edge cases (very low/high weights, extreme goals)
4. Test custom ratio adjustments
5. Verify validation prevents dangerous values
6. Test recalculation functionality
7. Compare results with established nutrition calculators

tasks.title: Dashboard Implementation
tasks.description: Create the main dashboard screen showing daily nutrition targets, progress, and quick access to core features
tasks.details:
1. Design and implement dashboard layout with:
   - Daily calorie target and current consumption
   - Macro nutrient progress rings (protein, carbs, fats)
   - Quick-add buttons for meal categories
   - Today's meal log summary
   - Progress towards goals
2. Implement color-coded indicators (green=on target, yellow=close, red=exceeded)
3. Create daily reset logic for tracking
4. Add pull-to-refresh functionality
5. Implement navigation to all main app sections
6. Add educational tooltips explaining each metric
7. Create empty states for first-time users
8. Optimize rendering performance for frequent updates
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test dashboard rendering with various data states
2. Verify calculations match expected values
3. Test color indicators at different thresholds
4. Verify navigation to all main sections
5. Test empty states and first-time user experience
6. Performance testing for rendering speed
7. Usability testing for information clarity

tasks.title: Food Database Integration
tasks.description: Integrate with Open Food Facts API and implement the local food database with basic ingredients
tasks.details:
1. Create API service for Open Food Facts integration
2. Implement barcode scanning functionality
3. Create search interface with text input and filters
4. Implement local caching of frequently accessed foods
5. Create data model for food items with all required nutritional fields
6. Seed database with 100 common ingredients from USDA FoodData Central:
   - Raw meats, poultry, fish
   - Vegetables, fruits
   - Grains, legumes, nuts
   - Dairy products, eggs
   - Cooking oils and condiments
7. Implement fuzzy search for forgiving name matching
8. Create synchronization logic for database updates
9. Add error handling for API failures with fallbacks
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test API integration with real Open Food Facts requests
2. Verify barcode scanning with various product barcodes
3. Test search functionality with partial and misspelled terms
4. Verify local caching reduces API calls
5. Test database seeding and data integrity
6. Verify offline functionality with cached items
7. Performance testing for search response time

tasks.title: Meal Logging Interface
tasks.description: Implement the meal logging functionality allowing users to log foods with accurate nutritional data
tasks.details:
1. Create meal logging flow:
   - Meal type selection (breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack)
   - Food search interface
   - Portion size selection with common units
   - Add multiple items to a meal
   - Review and save functionality
2. Implement portion size converter between different units
3. Create recent/frequent items list for quick access
4. Add favorites functionality
5. Implement meal notes field
6. Create swipe-to-delete for logged items
7. Implement copy meals from previous days
8. Add validation to prevent duplicate entries
9. Create detailed nutritional breakdown view for meals
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test full meal logging flow from selection to saving
2. Verify unit conversions are accurate
3. Test adding multiple items to a meal
4. Verify recent/favorites functionality
5. Test editing and deleting logged items
6. Verify meal copying from previous days
7. Test nutritional calculations for complete meals
8. Usability testing for logging speed and ease

tasks.title: AI Food Scanner - Camera Interface
tasks.description: Implement the camera interface for the AI food scanner feature
tasks.details:
1. Integrate react-native-vision-camera for camera functionality
2. Create camera viewfinder with guide overlay for optimal food positioning
3. Implement camera controls (flash, focus, gallery upload)
4. Add real-time preview of captured image
5. Implement image preprocessing to optimize quality
6. Add auto-compression for images over 4MB
7. Create gallery picker for existing photos
8. Implement permission handling for camera access
9. Add loading indicators and error states
10. Create fallback to manual entry if camera unavailable
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test camera functionality on various devices
2. Verify image capture quality and preprocessing
3. Test compression for large images
4. Verify gallery picker functionality
5. Test permission flows (granted, denied, requested)
6. Verify fallback to manual entry
7. Test in various lighting conditions
8. Verify UI elements don't interfere with viewfinder

tasks.title: AI Food Scanner - API Integration
tasks.description: Implement the AI API integration for food recognition from images
tasks.details:
1. Create API service for OpenAI Vision API integration
2. Implement secure token storage using device keychain/keystore
3. Create token configuration screen with setup instructions
4. Implement optimized vision-language model prompts for food recognition
5. Add response parsing to extract:
   - Food item identification
   - Estimated portion size
   - Suggested nutritional values
   - Confidence score
6. Implement 30-second timeout with retry logic
7. Create token usage tracking and cost estimation
8. Add error handling for API failures
9. Implement result review screen before saving
10. Create fallback to manual entry if AI fails
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test API integration with sample food images
2. Verify token storage security
3. Test timeout and retry functionality
4. Verify response parsing accuracy
5. Test with various food types (packaged, raw, prepared)
6. Verify token usage tracking
7. Test error handling and fallbacks
8. Verify result review and editing functionality

tasks.title: Recipe Management - Creation Interface
tasks.description: Implement the recipe creation and management functionality
tasks.details:
1. Create recipe builder interface with:
   - Recipe name and servings input
   - Ingredient search and selection
   - Quantity and unit selection per ingredient
   - Optional preparation notes
   - Tags/categories assignment
2. Implement automatic nutrition calculation per serving
3. Create recipe library view with search and filtering
4. Add recipe editing functionality
5. Implement recipe deletion with confirmation
6. Create recipe detail view showing ingredients and nutrition
7. Add quick-log functionality from recipe library
8. Implement recipe categorization and tagging system
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test full recipe creation flow
2. Verify nutrition calculations are accurate
3. Test recipe editing and updating
4. Verify search and filtering in recipe library
5. Test recipe deletion and confirmation
6. Verify quick-logging from recipe library
7. Test with recipes containing many ingredients
8. Verify categorization and tagging system

tasks.title: Recipe Import/Export Functionality
tasks.description: Implement recipe sharing via export and import functionality
tasks.details:
1. Create JSON schema for recipe export format
2. Implement export functionality with file generation
3. Add share options using native share sheet
4. Create import parser with validation
5. Implement conflict resolution for duplicate recipes
6. Add import success/failure feedback
7. Create batch export/import for multiple recipes
8. Implement permission handling for file access
9. Add documentation for export format
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test export functionality and file generation
2. Verify exported JSON adheres to schema
3. Test sharing via various apps
4. Verify import parsing and validation
5. Test conflict resolution with duplicate recipes
6. Verify batch operations for multiple recipes
7. Test with malformed import files
8. Verify permissions handling

4. Create empty states for days without logs
5. Implement date selection via calendar

tasks.testStrategy:

2. Verify daily summary calculations
3. Test navigation between days
4. Verify empty states for days without logs
5. Test meal editing from history
6. Verify streak tracking accuracy

2. Test with TalkBack on Android
3. Verify all UI elements have proper labels

5. Verify high contrast mode works correctly

tasks.title: Performance Optimization

tasks.details:
1. Implement list virtualization for long scrolling lists
2. Add image caching and optimization
3. Create efficient database query patterns
4. Implement memoization for expensive calculations
5. Add lazy loading for non-critical components
6. Create background processing for intensive tasks
7. Implement proper memory management
8. Add performance monitoring and analytics
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Measure and compare render times before/after
2. Test scrolling performance on long lists
3. Verify memory usage remains stable
4. Test battery consumption during typical usage
5. Verify app launch time meets requirements
6. Test performance on lower-end devices
7. Verify background processing doesn't affect UI
8. Conduct performance profiling with React DevTools

3. Test recovery from common error scenarios

5. Test network error handling with poor connectivity
6. Verify debug mode provides additional information

8. Verify user-facing error messages are helpful

8. Add security audit logging
tasks.testStrategy:

2. Verify biometric authentication works correctly

5. Test data deletion is complete
6. Verify privacy controls work as expected

tasks.title: Localization Framework
tasks.description: Implement localization framework for future language support
tasks.details:
1. Set up i18n framework (i18next or similar)
2. Create English language files as base
3. Implement string extraction workflow
4. Add language selection in settings
5. Create date/time/number formatting based on locale
6. Implement RTL support for future languages
7. Add translation contribution guidelines

tasks.testStrategy:

2. Test language switching functionality
3. Verify date/time/number formatting is correct
4. Test RTL layout in development mode
5. Verify no hardcoded strings remain
6. Test with pseudo-localization to find issues
7. Verify translation workflow is documented
8. Test automated validation of translations

tasks.title: App Store Preparation and Deployment
tasks.description: Prepare the app for submission to iOS App Store and Google Play Store
tasks.details:
1. Create app icons and splash screens for all required sizes
2. Write App Store descriptions and metadata
3. Create screenshots for store listings
4. Implement app signing and code signing
5. Create privacy policy and terms of service documents
6. Set up CI/CD pipeline for automated builds
7. Implement app versioning strategy
8. Create release notes template
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify app passes App Store review guidelines
2. Test app on various devices for screenshot capture
3. Verify all required metadata is complete
4. Test signed builds on test devices
5. Verify privacy policy covers all data usage
6. Test CI/CD pipeline with test builds
7. Verify version and build numbers increment correctly
8. Conduct final QA testing on production builds
